name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Python Backend Engineer with 9+ years of experience specializing in backend development and cloud architecture. Proficient in **Python**, **FastAPI**, **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and cloud services such as **GCP** and **Azure**. Skilled in implementing CI/CD pipelines using **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Terraform**, ensuring seamless deployments and scalability. Experienced in Agile methodologies and capable of leading cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality solutions. Additionally, adept at utilizing **GitLab** for version control and managing workflows, with familiarity in data processing using **Airflow** and **PySpark**, as well as search capabilities leveraging **Elasticsearch**. Committed to optimizing development processes through innovative strategies and hands-on expertise.
